column4: I need some help. I wanted to get gnome 2.10 so I changed my /etc/apt/sources.list to hoary instead of warty and did "apt-get upgrade gnome" after about 45 minutes on my g3 powerbook it finished and I rebooted. now all the icons are just sheets of paper. it's a minor problem but it is an annoying problem. what can I do?
I don't want to upgrade everything, just gnome.
ah what the hell, okay, i'll do it
